title: Asteroid Collector
description: An entity uses arms to grab asteroid chunks from space.

index.description: The index of the filter in the GUI, 1-indexed.

name.description: The name of a valid Factorio asteroid chunk.

result_inventory.title: Result Inventory Object
result_inventory.description: Inventory object which holds the limiting bar for this entity.
result_inventory.TODO: Make this a reference to an `Inventory` object

chunk-filter.title: Chunk Filters
chunk-filter.description: A static list of chunk filters that this collector should abide by. Does nothing if `'circuit_set_filters'` is `true`.

circuit_set_filters.description: Whether or not the chunk filters of this entity should be specified by a connected circuit network. Overwrites the `'chunk-filter'` array if both are specified.

circuit_read_contents.title: Circuit Read Contents
circuit_read_contents.description: Whether or not to broadcast the items contained within this machine's inventory to any connected circuit network.

include_hands.title: Include Hands
include_hands.description: Whether or not the items currently in the asteroid collector's arms should be included in the total amount reported to the circuit network. Only has an effect if `'circuit_read_contents'` is `true`.
